doc.previous: where the Lorentz factor is  Examples of other 4 vectors include the four velocity U defined as the derivative of the position 4 vector with respect to proper time
doc.after: The relativistic energy and relativistic momentum of an object are respectively the timelike and spacelike components of a contravariant four momentum vector  where m is the invariant mass
